name: Computing-skills-march-2015
tagline: A series of workshops on basic computing skills for CAMH researchers
body:
These workshops will focus on some basic computing skills you need
for getting study data organized, using the CAMH compute cluster (SCC), and
generally doing computing-oriented scientific work.

You should attend if you are doing any sort of scientific computing work. If you have questions, send me email: jon.pipitone@camh.ca
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
